This repository contains a LIVE SaaS product.

Stack:
- FastAPI backend deployed on Render
- React + Vite frontend deployed on Render
- Users generate clips from YouTube videos

Your task:
Continuously improve the product without breaking existing functionality.

Priority order:
1) Fix bugs
2) Improve UX
3) Add features
4) Improve performance
5) Improve monetization potential

Never remove working functionality.
Always build on top of the MVP.
